org.talares.datatypes

Class DeferredList<A extends org.talares.api.datatypes.items.Item,B>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.talares.datatypes.DeferredList<A,B>

  • public class DeferredList<A extends org.talares.api.datatypes.items.Item,B>
extends java.lang.Object
    A DeferredList instance holds a F.Promise of a List of B to be resolved by an additional call to the webservice.

    The call to said webservice will only be triggered when the value method is accessed.

    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public final play.libs.F.Promise<java.util.List<B>> getValue()
        Gets the F.Promise of a List of B this DeferredList holds.

        Fetches the Future from the Scala DeferredSeq and wraps it in a F.Promise.

        Then applies the Deferred.transformFunc to morph the result from a Scala Seq of A it's Java counterpart; a List of B.

        Returns:
        a F.Promise of B

      • getValue_

        public final java.util.List<B> getValue_(long timeout)
                                  throws org.talares.api.exceptions.TalaresException
        BLOCKING

        Get the List of B held by this DeferredList.

        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout in milliseconds within which the List of B should be present
        Returns:
        an instance of B
        Throws:
        org.talares.api.exceptions.TalaresException
